channel.title: Microsoft Developer Blogs
channel.description: Get the latest information, insights, announcements, and news from Microsoft.

item.title: 【Supercharge your testing experience with MSTest.Analyzers】使用 MSTest.Analyzers 增强您的测试体验
item.description: 【MSTest ships with extensive suite of code analyzers to help you write well-formed, performant and error free tests.】MSTest 附带了广泛的代码分析器套件，可帮助您编写格式良好、高性能且无错误的测试。

item.title: 【Prevent Critical Bugs with MSVC Code Analysis】通过 MSVC 代码分析防止严重错误
item.description: 【Imagine this: You’re deep into a complex C++ project, and everything seems to be running smoothly. But then, out of nowhere, a critical bug surfaces— one that requires a bit more foresight. We’ve all been there, right? This is where code analysis steps in as your silent guardian. 】想象一下：您正在深入研究一个复杂的 C++ 项目，并且一切似乎都运行得很顺利。但随后，一个严重的错误突然出现——需要更多的远见。我们都去过那里，对吗？这就是代码分析作为你沉默的守护者介入的地方。

item.title: 【What does ERROR_KEY_DELETED mean?】ERROR_KEY_DELETED 是什么意思？
item.description: 【You now have a handle to a key that doesn't exist, and there's nothing you can do with it.】现在，您拥有了一个不存在的密钥的句柄，并且您无法使用它执行任何操作。

item.title: 【Announcing the General Availability of the VS Code extension for Azure Machine Learning】宣布面向 Azure 机器学习的 VS Code 扩展全面可用
item.description: 【Machine learning and artificial intelligence are transforming the world as we know it. With the power of data, you will have countless opportunities to create something new, unique, and exciting. Whether you are a seasoned data scientist or a curious beginner,】机器学习和人工智能正在改变我们所知的世界。借助数据的力量，您将有无数的机会来创造新的、独特的和令人兴奋的东西。无论您是经验丰富的数据科学家还是好奇的初学者，

item.title: 【Microsoft 365 Certification control spotlight: Application control】Microsoft 365 认证控制焦点：应用程序控制
item.description: 【Explore how Microsoft 365 Certification validates application controls for enterprise-ready apps.】探索 Microsoft 365 认证如何验证企业就绪应用的应用程序控制。

item.title: 【Diving into Function Calling and its JSON Schema in Semantic Kernel Python】深入研究语义内核 Python 中的函数调用及其 JSON 模式
item.description: 【One of the most exciting features available in certain Large Language Models (LLMs) is function-calling. In Semantic Kernel, we handle the heavy lifting so that you can bring your own code or utilize built-in plugins that cater to your use case.】某些大型语言模型 (LLM) 中最令人兴奋的功能之一是函数调用。在语义内核中，我们处理繁重的工作，以便您可以携带自己的代码或利用适合您的用例的内置插件。

item.title: 【Enhancing Code Comprehension: GitHub Copilot’s Features in Visual Studio 2022 17.11】增强代码理解：Visual Studio 2022 17.11 中的 GitHub Copilot 功能
item.description: 【GitHub Copilot in Visual Studio 2022 17.11 now offers an improved experience you to refer to their methods, classes, functions, and entire solution directly within the chat. By using the # symbol followed by the name of a method, class, or function,】Visual Studio 2022 17.11 中的 GitHub Copilot 现在提供改进的体验，您可以直接在聊天中引用其方法、类、函数和整个解决方案。通过使用 # 符号后跟方法、类或函数的名称，

item.title: 【The role of the activation factory in the Windows Runtime】激活工厂在 Windows 运行时中的作用
item.description: 【The activation factory represents the class itself.】激活工厂代表类本身。

item.title: 【Announcing Windows Community Toolkit v8.1】发布 Windows 社区工具包 v8.1
item.description: 【Announcing Windows Community Toolkit v8.1 We’re happy to announce that version 8.1 is available today! It’s a minor update which contains a variety of new features and improvements, made possible again with the support and contributions of our developer community. 🎉 If you’re not familiar with the Windows Community Toolkit,】发布 Windows 社区工具包 v8.1 我们很高兴地宣布 8.1 版现已推出！这是一个小更新，包含各种新功能和改进，在我们开发者社区的支持和贡献下再次成为可能。 🎉 如果您不熟悉 Windows 社区工具包，

item.title: 【Introducing Object Limit Tracker in Azure DevOps】Azure DevOps 中引入对象限制跟踪器
item.description: 【We’re excited to introduce the Object Limit Tracker in Azure DevOps! This new feature provides real-time visibility into resource usage for each organization and project directly within Azure DevOps. By offering insights into commonly asked limits, we enable users to manage resources more proactively and prevent potential issues.】我们很高兴在 Azure DevOps 中引入对象限制跟踪器！这项新功能可以直接在 Azure DevOps 中实时了解每个组织和项目的资源使用情况。通过提供对常见限制的见解，我们使用户能够更主动地管理资源并防止潜在问题。
